author: sanders
msg: Updated Digester to allow just setting a SAX2 Reader into Digester.  This
completly gets around Weblogic 6.0 locking down the JAXP 1.0 distribution.
All you need to have is SAX2 somewhere in the classpath, and then create an
XMLReader, and set it in.  This will bypass Digester's namespace and
validation settings, but at least it will work.
The offending call, BTW, is the call to SAXParser.parse.  In JAXP 1.0,
it takes a DefaultHandler as an argument, and was updated in JAXP 1.1.

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the Package Description portion of the Digester javadocs to reflect
all the new features that have been added since the 1.0 release.

author: husted
msg: Add getItems(), getSkipDays, and getSkipHours to rss.Channel class,
to allow use of tags expecting accessors in this format (e.g the Struts bean:write tag).

author: craigmcc
msg: RulesBase.match() must return a zero-length list if there are no matching
rules.  It was incorrectly returning null in some circumstances.
